content: There are many dashboard components from SF Labs including the Apex Dashboard Kit which can be installed:
title: Question 1

content: Customizable Forecasting cannot be enabled for use with Custom Fiscal Years
title: Question 2

content:
Northern Trail outfitters has hired interns to enter Leads into Salesforce and has requested a way to is identify these new records from existing Leads.
What approach should an administrator take to meet this requirement?
options: A. Set up Web-to-Lead form the interns use.
B. Create a separate Lead Lightning App.
C. Update the active Leas Assignment Rules.
D. Define a record type and assign it to the interns.
title: Question 3

content:
AW Computing has six sales teams in a region. These teams always consists of the same account manager, engineer, and assistant.
What should the administrator configure to make it easier for teams to collaborate with the same customer?
options: A. Create a queue for each team and assign account ownership to the queue.
B. Enable account teams and show the users how to set up a default account team.
C. Enable and configure standard opportunity teams with splits.
D. Propose the users manually share all their accounts with their teammates.
title: Question 4

content: In order to enable multi-currency feature in Salesforce, you must
options: A. Check the Enable Multi-currency checkbox in your Chatter profile
C. You cannot enable this feature once you've implemented Salesforce.
D. Operate your business in at least two different countries

content: Who can invite Chatter customers into a Chatter group?

content: On which of these areas Data Validation rules are enforced but no feedback is given to users?

content:
Dreamhouse Reality just announced its new home concierge offering. This product is unlike anything the company has offered in the past and follows a different business model.
What Should the administrator Configure to meet this requirement?
options: B. Create a new approval process.
C. Create a new Opportunity product.
D. Create a new sales process.
title: Question 8

content: Which of the following records can not be mass transferred?
title: Question 9

content: An Approval Process begins when a record is:

content:
An Administrator at DreamHouse Realty wants an easier way to assign an agent capacity and
skill set. Which feature should the administrator enable to meet this requirement?

content:
A sales rep has a list of 300 accounts with contacts that they want to load at one time.
Which tool should the administrator utilize to import the records to salesforce?

content: Which Type of Reports can't be used to create groups of data or charts?

content: When a Lead is converted, an Account, Contact and _______ record are created.
title: Question 14

content:
The administrator at universal containers has a screen flow that helps users create new leads.
When lead source is "Search Engine", the administrator needs to require the user to choose a specific
a search engine from a picklist. If lead source is not "Search Engine", this picklist should be hidden.
How should the administrator complete this requirement?
options:
A. Configure a picklist for specific search engine, and use a validation rule to conditionally show only
         when lead source is "Search Engine"

B. Assign a decision element to direct the user to a second screen to hold specific search engine only
         when a lead source is "Search Engine".

C. Create a picklist for specific search engine, and set conditional visibility so that is only shown
         when lead source is "Search Engine".

D. Use an assignment element, one for when lead source is "Search Engine" and one for everything
         else.
title: Question 15

content:
Northern Trail Outfitters wants to track ROI for contacts that are key stakeholders for opportunities.
The VP of Sales requested that this information be accessible on the opportunity and available for reporting.
Which two options should the administrator configure to meet these requirements?
Choose 2 answers
options: B. Add the Opportunity Contact Role related list to the Opportunity page layout.
C. Add the Campaign Member related list to the Opportunity page layout.
title: Question 16

content: According to Sales Force, console is not for occasional users of SalesForce. The console is best set up for users who view SalesForce for 3 or more hours a day.
title: Question 17

content: Define the Matrix Report.
title: Question 18
explanation:
Summarizes
 data in a grid against
 horizontal and vertical
 criteria. Matrix reports
 provid
 totals for both rows and columns. Matrix reports may also be used to support dashboard components.

content:
An administrator at Dreamhouse Reality needs to Create Customized pages for the salesforce mobile app.
Which two types of pages could an administrator build and customize using the Lightning App Builder?
Choose 2 Answers

The sales team at Ursa Major Solar has asked the administrator to automate an outbound message.

content:
Universal Containers (UC) has a queue that is used for managing tasks that need to be worked by the
UC customer support team. The same team will now be working some of UC's Cases.
Which two options should the administrator use to help the support team?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Add Cass to the existing queue as available object.
B. Configure a flow to assign the cases to the queue.
C. Use assignment rules to set the queue as the owner of the case.
D. Create a new queue and add Cases as an available object.

content: A _________ defines a collection of settings and permissions that determines what users can see in the user interface, and what they can do.

content: Roles are available in Personal and Group edition

content:
Clod Kicks has the organization wide defaults for Opportunity set to private.
which two features should the administrator use to open up access to Opportunity records for sales users working on collaborative deals?

content:
Universal Container wants to prevent its service team from accessing deal records. While service users are unable to access deal list views, they are able to find the deal records via a search.
What options should the administrator adjust to fully restrict access?
options: A. App permissions and search terms
B. Record setting and search index
C. Page layouts and field- level security

content: Where do you go to create a List View so that you can see it on the Console, under the Accounts object?

B. Create a field on the Console
C. Create a list view on Accounts
D. Create a list view on Contacts

content: Which of following is granted by the Manage Cases Permission (Select all that apply)?

content: The org wide default is set to private. Phil smith the owner of ABC account is a US Sales Rep reporting to the US Sales Director. The users in the US sales rep role can edit ALL opportunities associated with the accounts they own. Tim an EMEA sales rep owns an opportunity associated with the ABC account. Identify the correct role access.
options: A. TIM cannot VIEW / EDIT phils account
B. Tim can VIEW but cannot EDIT phils account.
C. Phil can EDIT and VIEW Tims ABC opportunity
D. Phil can view but cannot edit Tims ABC opportunity
E. Tim can VIEW and EDIT Phils account

content: When looking at a vertical column chart, what can a user click on to drill down to a filtered source report? Choose 3 answers

content: When using Territory Management, can an opportunity be associated with multiple territories?
title: Question 39
explanation: Accounts and Users can be associated with multiple opportunities but Opportunities can only be in one territory.

DreamHouse Realty regularly processes customer requests for warranty work and would like to offer customers a self-serve option to generate cases.

title: Question 45

content:
Cloud Kicks has created a screen flow for their sales team to use when they add new leads. The screen
flow collect name, email and shoe preference.
which two things should the administrator do to display the screen flow?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Create a tab and add the screen flow to the page.
B. install an app from the AppExchange
C. Add the flow in the utility bar of the console
D. use a flow element and add the screen flow to the record page.
title: Question 46

content: Partner portal and customer portal users aren't required to activate computers to log in.

content: Which statement is TRUE regarding look up filters? Choose 2 answers
options: A. Lookup filters can restrict lookup dialog results based on fields on the source object
B. The special date values "Today" and "This Month" are valid criteria options.
C. Lookup filters are available in the Partner and Customer Portals
D. Lookup filters are case sensitive
title: Question 48

content: YOU are working with a Professional Edition organization. They wish to install the Expense Tracker which requires the use of 4 custom tabs, 3 custom objects, and one custom app. If the company is already using 4 applications, 36 custom objects, and 7 custom tabs, what will happen when they try to install Expense Tracker?
options: B. The installation will succeed, but only the reports,
C. They will not be able to complete the installation process as they have reached the maximum number of custom tabs
D. They will not be able to complete the installation process as they have reached the maximum number of custom objects

content: How many Editions are there in Salesforce.com

content:
Cloud Kicks users are seeing error messages when they use one of their screen flows. The error
messages are confusing but could be resolved if the users entered more information on the account
before starting the flow.
How should the administrator address this issues?
options:
A. use a fault connector and display a screen with text explaining what went wrong and how to correct
         it.
B. Uncheck the end user Flow Errors box in setup.
C. Create a permission set to allow users to bypass the error.
D. Remove validation rules so that the users are able to process without complete records.
title: Question 51

content: To minimize the number of sharing rules, use "Roles and Subordinates" over "Roles" where possible.

content: Which is a consideration when creating a drill-to-detail dashboard component?
options: A. The source report must be grouped by record name, record owner, or feed post.
B. The dashboard component type must be a gauge.
C. Drill-to-detail must be enabled on the custom report type.
D. The source report must be stored in the drill-to-detail folder.

content: Lookup fields allow users to select a record from another object during data entry, creating a parent- child relationship.
title: Question 54

content: Which statements are true about business processes?
options: A. Each record type is associated with one or more business processes
B. Record types implement business processes through page layouts
C. For opportunity objects records are created before business processes
D. Each business process is associated with one or more record types
E. Record types help track sales lifecycle s across divisions, groups and markets.

content:
Universal Containers (UC) has a queue that is used for managing tasks that need to be worked by the UC customer support team. The same team will now be working some of UC's Cases.

options: A. Add Cass to the existing queue as available object.
B. Configure a flow to assign the cases to the queue.
C. Create a new queue and add Cases as an available object.
D. Use assignment rules to set the queue as the owner of the case.

content: Workflow rules are triggered when a standard object in a master-detail relationship is re-parented, even if the object's evaluation criteria is set to When a record is created, or when a record is edited and did not previously meet the rule criteria.

content:
Ursa Major Solar offers amazing experiences for all of it employees. The Employee engagement
committee wants to post updates while restricting other employees from posting.
What should the administrator create to meet this request?

content:
Using the following hierarchy, if a sharing rule exists granting Operations Person Read/Write access to Sales Management on the Account Object, what access does Operations Management have to Sales Management's accounts?
Default access for the
Account object is Public Read Only.
Executive Management
Sales Management
Sales Person
Operations Management
Operations Person
title: Question 60
explanation: Read/Write is granted through role hierarchy permissions from the sharing rule. If the sharing rule referenced a sharing group then the Grant Access Using Hierarchies would not apply. This could also be true for a custom object; all standard objects require Grant Access Using Hierarchies.

content: Use ____________ to filter or segment picklist values based on the user's profile.

Ursa Major classifies its accounts as Silver, Gold, or Platinum Level. When a new case is created for a Silver or Gold partner, it should to the Regular Support Queue. When an account is Platinum Level, it should automatically go to the Priority Support Queue.

options: A. Either Reports, Dashboards, Documents, or Email templates

Northern Trail Outfitters wants to calculate how much revenue has been generated for each of its marketing campaigns.
How should an administrator deliver this information?
options: A. Add a Total Value Field on campaign and use a workflow rule to update the value when an opportunity is won.
B. Design a standard Campaign report and add the value Won Opportunities in Campaign field.
C. Perform periodic data job to update campaign records.
D. Create a roll-up summary field on Opportunity to Campaign.

What should an administrator use as an identifier when importing and updating records from a
separate financial system?

content: Which of these has many-to-many relationship?
options: A. Each solution can be associated with multiple cases, but a case can be associated with only one case
B. Each solution is associated with one case, but a case can be associated with multiple solutions
C. Each solution is associated with one case, one case associated with only one solution
D. Each solution can be associated with multiple cases and a case can be associated with multiple solutions

C. Connecting SFDC with Outlook and submitting contacts and leads to SFDC directly from my email

An administrator needs to create a one-to-many relationship between two objects with limited access to child records.

Cloud Kicks want to have consistency when communication with customers on cases. The company has requested messages to be sent in an email channel with categories to help search for the proper message.

content: Adding a user to the sales team group will give access to opportunity records that was previously a restricted account.

content:
AW Computing (AWC) occasionally works with independent contractors, who the company
stores as Contacts in Salesforce. Contractors often change agencies, and AWC wants to maintain the
historical accuracy of the record.
What should AWC use to track Contacts?
options: A. Use a partner community to track the Contacts.
B. Enable Contacts to multiple Accounts.
C. Create a Junction object to track many-to-many relationship.
D. Create a new Contact record for each agency.

content: Which Step is not a part of creating custom application?

content:
An administrator installed a managed package that contains a permission set group. The
permission set group that was installed includes Delete access on several objects, and the administrator
needs to prevent users in the permission set group from being able to delete records.
What should the administrator do to control Delete access?
options: A. Use a muting permission set with a permission set group to mute selected permissions.
B. Create a new permission set that has Delete access deselected for the objects.
C. Edit the profile for the users to remove Delete access from the objects.
D. Create a new role that prevents Delete permissions from rolling up to the users.
title: Question 96

content:
Sales and Customer Care at Ursa Major Solar need to see different fields on the Case related list
from the Account record. Sales users want to see Case created date and status while Customer Care
would like to see owner, status, and contact.
What should the administrator use to achieve this?

content: The Self Service Portal and Customer Portal are the same technology?

content: Queues cannot be created on which Object in salesforce.com?

content: Adding Records: I must always search for a company or contact record BEFORE adding a new lead, opportunity, contact, or account into Salesforce.

content: This helps you manage the complete lifecycle of customer service,from logging cases to suggesting and delivering solutions across multiple channels, including Web self-service and live agent support:
title: Question 101

content: What is true about a Web-to-Lead?
options: A. Determines which Email Template to send to leads generated via Web-to-Lead
B. Email Template response content published on your web site
C. Contains Rule Entries that determine criteria for determining
D. An online form to capture lead information

content: What does a profile control?
options: A. Fields available for view in related lists
C. Tasks that users can perform on records they access
D. View of records that users access

content: What is the Impact on a User of the Organization level Locale Changes?
options: A. From a new session, user will see everything in the New Organization Locale
B. The User is asked for a Choice; if he would like to choose New Organization Locale or his own Locale
C. The default Locale of the user is also set to the new Organization Level locale
D. No Impact on the User as he keeps using his own default Locale

content:
An Administrator wants to trigger a follow-up task for the opportunity owner when they close an opportunity as won and another task after 60 days to check in with the customer.
which two automation tools should the administrator use?
Choose 2 answers

content: When are the formula fields Re - Calculated?
options: B. Admin can set the time of Refresh
D. Every time they are seen

content: You can use a Custom Lookup field to create a relationship between an opportunity and a contact.

content: Editing Records: If I see a magnifying glass icon next to any field in SFDC, this means I can start typing into the field and matches will automatically appear to choose from. Or, I can click on the magnifying glass icon and look up data to fill the field with.

content: When creating a custom list view you can display fields that are not on your page layout for that object?
title: Question 109

content: The maximum number of values in controlling picklists is the same as in dependent picklists.

content:
Aw Computing needs to capture a loss reason in rich text field when an opportunity is Closed lost.
How should an administrator configure this requirement?
options: A. Check the required checkbox on the Loss Reason field in Object Manger.
B. Create a validation rule to display an error if stage is Closed lost and Loss Reason is blank.
C. Configure a workflow rule to display an error if Loss Reason is blank
D. Select the requirement checkbox next to the loss reason field on the page layout.
title: Question 111

content: You can use standard reports when creating

content: How many fields can be enabled for tracking on a custom Object?

content: Which one of these is NOT a recorded "activity" in SFDC?
options: E. Log a Call (after call completion)
title: Question 114

content: Which definition best describes "accounts" and their relationships with other record types in SFDC?
options: A. Accounts represent sales deals that your company is pursuing. An account may have only one opportunity associated with it.
B. Accounts are the backbone of information and represent prospective, existing, and former customers. An account may have multiple opportunities
C. Accounts are created after you have closed an opportunity or deal. An account must have a closed opportunity associated with it.
title: Question 115

content: Is it possible for users to override their own forecasts and forecasts for users below them in the forecast hierarchy?

content:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) has deployed my domain. The Chief Marketing Officer wants to make sure that all of the Salesforce users log in using the branded login URL. There needs to be a grace period for the user's bookmarks to be updated.
How should the administrator configure the policies in my domain settings?
options: A. Set the redirect policy to Redirect with a warning to the same page within the domain.
B. Set the login policy to require login from https://nto.my.salesforce.com
C. Set the login policy to prevent login from https://login.salesforce.com
D. Set the Redirect policy to Do Not redirect.
title: Question 117

content:
The administrator at Cloud kicks deleted a custom field but realized there is a business unit that still uses the field.
What should an administrator take into consideration when undeleting the field?
options: A. The field needs to be re-added to reports.
B. The field needs to be restored from the recycle bin.
C. The field history will remain deleted.
D. The field needs to be re-added to page Layouts.
title: Question 118

content: Recent item and Lookup Hovers use the Record Mini Page.

Ursa Solar Major is evaluating Salesforce for its service team and would like to know what objects
were available out of the box.
Which three of the standard objects are available to an administrator considering a support use case?
Choose 3 answers

content: How many objects may be imported or updated using the Data Loader?

content: I can email opportunities, accounts, leads, or contacts directly from SFDC, and all of these communications will be automatically saved in my activity history.

content: How many people can you send an invite to at a time using Cloud Scheduler?
options: A. You can invite up to 20 people to a meeting.
B. You can invite up to 55 people to a meeting.
C. You can invite up to 25 people to a meeting.
D. You can invite up to 50 people to a meeting.

content: During a lead import, you can choose to enable active assignment rules as part of the import
title: Question 124

content: A Profile is a collection of settings and permissions that determine what the user can do with records they have access to and how they view those records.

content: Which Feature is not available in Salesforce.com?
options: C. Organization based Login IP ranges
D. Profile based Login IP Ranges

content: The User Interface Settings can be adjusted for individual users.

content: If a profile does not have access to an application, that profile will also not have access to the tabs and objects of that application

content: When can inactive assignment rules be run on leads?
title: Question 129

content: What is not true about sharing Rules?
options: A. U can edit the access levels for any sharing rule. You can change the specified groups / roles for the rule
B. Sharing rules open up access whereas org wide defaults restrict access
C. Sharing rules apply to all new and existing records owned by the specified role / group members
D. When u delete a sharing rule, the sharing access created by that rule is automatically removed
E. When u modify which users are in a group rule, the sharing rules are re-evaluated to add/remove access as necessary.
title: Question 130

content: The Create New Folder link will only be visible to users with which permission
title: Question 131

content: Based solely on the role hierarchy a manager can do all of the following EXCEPT:
options: A. View records his subordinate does not own but can view
B. View, edit, delete, and transfer his/her and his/her subordinates records
C. View all folders his/her Subordinate has access to, i.e., Reports, Documents, and Email Templates
D. Extend sharing on both his/her and his/her subordinate's records
title: Question 132

content:
The marketing team wants a new picklist value added to the Campaign Member Status field for the upsell promotional campaign.
Which two solutions should the administrator use to modify the picklist field values?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Edit the picklist values for the Campaign Status in object Manager.
B. Mass modify the Campaign Member Statuses related list.
C. Add the Campaign Member Statuses related list to the Page Layout.
D. Modify the picklist value on the Campaign Member Statuses related list
title: Question 133

content:
A Sales user is trying to manage Campaign Members for an upcoming networking event. The user can view the Campaign, but add new Campaign Members or update Member statuses.
How can an administrator troubleshoot this problem?
options: A. Run a Campaign report and update any Member information via Data Loader.
B. Create a permission set to allow the user to edit Campaign Members.
C. Provide the user access to both Leads and Contacts to edit all Members.
D. Make sure the Marketing User Checkbox is checked on the user record page.
title: Question 134

content: If using Customizable forecasting there is a seperate forecast role hierarchy
title: Question 135

content: Queues can be made up of the following
title: Question 136

content: Which of the following are true about the field type "Text Area(Long)" ?
options:
A. 1) Maximum length of 32,000 chars. 2) Any length from 256 to 32,000 chars. is allowed 3) Line breaks count towards the max length of the field
         4) This data type is not available for activities or products on opportunities

B. 1) Maximum length of 32,000 chars. 2) Any length from 256 to 32,000 chars. is allowed 3) Line breaks count towards the max length of the field
         4) This data type is available for activities or products on opportunities

C. 1) Maximum length of 3200 chars. 2) Any length from 256 to 32,000 chars. is allowed 3) Line breaks do not count towards the max length of the field
         4) This data type is not available for activities or products on opportunities

D. 1) Maximum length of 32,000 chars. 2) Any length from 0 to 32,000 chars. is allowed 3) Line breaks do not count towards the max length of the field 4) This data type is not available for activities or products on opportunities
title: Question 137

content: Who can view campaigns?
options: C. Administrator and Marketing Users only
title: Question 138

content:
Once an opportunity reaches the negotiation stage at cloud kicks, The Amount fields becomes required for sales users. Sales managers need to be able to move opportunities inti this stage without knowing the amount.
How should the administrator require this field during the negotiation stage for sales users but allow their managers to make changes?
options: A. Create to formula field to fill in the field for managers.
B. Make the field required for all users.
C. Configure a validation rule to meet the criteria.
D. Assign the administrator profile to the managers.
title: Question 139

content:
The administrator at DreamHouse Realty added an email quick action to the Case page layout and is unable to see the action on the case feed.
Which feature must be enabled to ensure the quick action will be displayed as expected?
title: Question 140

content:
The administrator has been asked to automate a simple field update on the account. When a support agent changes the status of the account to 'Audited', they would like the system to automatically update the Audited date field on the account with today's date.
Which tool should the administrator use to complete this automation?
title: Question 141

content:
Northern Trail Outfitters is using one profile for all of its marketing users, providing read-only access to the Campaign object. A few marketing users now require comprehensive edit access on Campaigns.
How should an administrator fulfil this request?
title: Question 142

content: When I convert a lead to an Opportunity, I must give the opportunity a unique name so I know what it is (ex: Pacific Bank - Red Package).
title: Question 143

content: Manual sharing allows administrators to grant one-off access to individual records, users cannot grant this access even if they own the record.
title: Question 144

content: What is required to create a new user?
options: A. Unique Username in email format.
title: Question 145

content: You cannot delete a standard report.
title: Question 146

content: What are the three report types available when creating custom reports?
title: Question 147

content:
The administrator at cloud kicks has been ask to change the company's Shoe style field to prevent users from selecting more than one style on a record.
Which two steps should an administrator do to accomplish this?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Reactivate the appropriate Shoe Style values after the field type changes.
B. Change the field type from a multi-select picklist field to a picklist field.
C. Back-up the Shoe Style values in existing records.
D. Select the "Choose only one value "checkbox on the pick list field.
title: Question 148

content:
Dreamhouse realty wants to offer a form on its experience cloud site where inspectors will submit findings from a property inspection.
Which feature should an administrator place on the page to fulfill this requirement?
title: Question 149

content:
The administrator has created new users for ten new employees at Northern Trail Outfitters.
Why are these users unable to access the account object in the Salesforce or?
options: A. Users' profile requires a sharing rule for Accounts.
B. Users' profile requires permission to the Account object.
C. Organization-wide defaults are set to private.
D. Users' roles are low on the role hierarchy.
title: Question 150

content:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks has a Custom picklist field on Lead, Which is missing on the
Contact when leads are converted.
Which two items should the administrator do to make sure these values are populated?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Map the picklist field on the Lead to the Contact.
B. Create a custom picklist field on Contact.
C. Update the picklist value with a validation rule.
D. Set the picklist field to be required on the Lead Object.
title: Question 151

content: Determine if the description is Master/Detail or Lookup: Up to 25 such relationships

content: What is the purpose API Token field on the User object?
options: A. Indicates whether an API token has ever been reset.
B. Displays the users API token
C. Enables users to receive an API token

content: Data validation ensures the integrity of data when data is exported in SF

content:
The administrator at Ursa Major Solar imported records into an object by mistake.
Which two tools should be used to undo this import?
Choose 2 answers

content: Field Level Security cannot be used to make a field required.

content: Formatting of report is maintained when it is exported via Printable View?

content: Formula cannot reference any field that is restricted by Field level security

content: How many other fields may a custom lead field be mapped to when converting a lead?
options: A. Custom lead fields cannot be mapped
title: Question 159

content: Adding Records: If I add a duplicate record because I haven't searched before adding a new one, the following events will be likely to happen:
options: A. I will need to delete the duplicate record I have added, or merge the 2 duplicate records together.
C. The data quality in Salesforce.com will start to suck, and head office reports will no longer be accurate
D. I will feel so guilty that I will be compelled to sign over my commissions to Bill, who needs more money to save homeless cats in the city of Boston
E. I will complain when I inevitably end up adding notes or events to the wrong record

content:
A new Sales Rep at Ursa Major has a qualified lead that is ready for conversation.
When using the Lead Conversion process, which two records can be Created?

content: To enable Field History Tracking for an object, the system administrator must also add the related list to the page layout.

content: If you delete a case, which two also get deleted?

content: Custom formula fields can reference other custom formula fields including themselves.

content: Is it possible to report on the converted Leads?

content: Who can manually share records?
options: B. The record owner's manager's manager

content: What type of relationship should be built for a one-to-one?
title: Question 169

content: You cannot mass remove records from an approval process; removal of records must be done one by one.

content: Workflow rules never trigger on converted leads
title: Question 171
explanation: Workflow rules only trigger on converted leads if validation and triggers for lead convert are enabled in your organization.

content:
The administrator at Ursa Major Solar has been asked to change the work Item and Project Custom Object Relationship from a master detail to a Lookup.
Which Scenario Could prevent the administrator from fulfilling this requirement?
options: A. Roll-Up summary field sexist on the master object.
B. The Look-Up field is required for Saving Records.
C. A junction object is required to support the lookup.
D. The lookup field in all the records contains a value.
title: Question 172

content: What is the maximum length of any auto-number field?

content: The automated case user will be listed on the case history for all actions that are system defined, including:
options: A. When a case is escalated
B. When a case is created online via Web-to-Case
C. When a Workflow is Triggered
D. When a case is automatically assigned using assignment rules
title: Question 174

content:
What are two considerations an administrator should keep in mind when working with Salesforce objects?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Only standard objects support master-detail relationships.
B. Custom and standard objects have standard fields.
C. Standard objects are included with Salesforce.
D. A new standard object can be created.
title: Question 175

content:
Northern Trail Outfitters has a custom quick action on Account that creates a new Case.
How should an administrator make the quick action available on the Salesforce mobile app?
options: A. Modify compact Case page layout to include the action.
B. Add the Salesforce Mobile and Lightning Experience action to the page layout.
C. Include the action in the Salesforce Mobile Navigation menu.
D. Create a custom Lightning App with the action.
title: Question 176

content: The following can be done by a System Admin to a standard field.
options: F. Add/edit values of a picklist
title: Question 177

content: When you define a Data Validation Rule, what else must you also define?
options: A. Whether or not the record gets deleted
C. What email gets sent if the Rule triggers
D. Whether or not the field is required
title: Question 178

content: Related Lists display the many side of a one-to-many relationship
title: Question 179

content: Salesforce.com instance has Multiple Currencies as Activated. What is the maximum granularity available for tracking changes in Currency Rates
title: Question 180

content: Even a user with "View all data" (VAD) permission cannot view hidden folders as well as folders shared to no one.
title: Question 181

content: The _______ determines if a user can read, create and edit Contact records, the __________ determines if he can see/edit contact records owned by his subordinates.
title: Question 182

content:
The sales manager at Cloud Kicks wants to set up a business process where opportunity discounts over 30% need to be approved by the VP of sales. Any discounts above 10% need to be approved by the user's manager. The administrator has been tasked with creating an approval process.
Which are two considerations the administrator needs to review before setting up this approval process?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Populate the Manager standard field on the sales users' User Detail page.
B. Create a custom Discount field on the opportunity to capture the discount amount
C. Allow the submitter choose the approver manually.
D. Configure two separate approval processes.
title: Question 183

content: Which of the following is true if you remove the "Read" permission from a users profile for a standard object?
options: A. Tabs of that object type will be visible, Fields of that type will not be visible on other tabs, related lists of that type will be visible on other tabs, search results will not return records of that type, report data for records of that type will not be available, merge fields of that type will not be available, and custom links of that type will not be visible

B. Tabs of that object type will not be visible, Fields of that type will not be visible on other tabs, related lists of that type will not be visible on other tabs, search results will not return records of that type, report data for records of that type will not be available, merge fields of that type will not be available, and custom links of that type will not be visible

C. Tabs of that object type will not be visible, Fields of that type will be visible on other tabs, related lists of that type will not be visible on other tabs, search results will not return records of that type, report data for records of that type will not be available, merge fields of that type will not be available, and custom links of that type will not be visible
title: Question 184

content: You must be a user of salesforce.com in order to Receive an email notification in the case escalation process:

content: Can the DataLoader access all objects?

content:
AW Computing has added a new custom text field called Market Segment on the Lead object. When a Lead is converted, the new field is not getting copied to the Account record.
What should the administrator do to ensure the Market Segment field from a Lead is copied to the converted Account record in routine?
options: A. Ensure Account has a field that has the exact same name as the new Lead field.
B. Write a record-triggered flow to copy the custom field from Lead to Account.
C. Write a Validation Rule to ensure the Account has a value in that field.
D. Ensure the Market Segment field on the Lead is mapped to right field on Account.
title: Question 188

content:
Ursa Major Solar has a path on Case. The company wants to require its users to follow the status values as they are on the path. Agents should be prohibited from reverting the Case back to a previous status.
Which feature should an administrator use to fulfill this request?
title: Question 189

content: Which function is available in the report builder interface, prior to running the report?
title: Question 190

content:
Sales reps miss key fields when filling out on opportunity record through the process. Reps need to move forward Win unable to enter previous stage.
Which three options should the administrator use to address this need?
Choose Three answers
options: C. Mark fields required on the page layout.
E. Use Flow to mark fields required.
title: Question 191

content: Which statements are true for the integrated campaign builder?
options: A. The maximum number of Leads/Contacts that can be added from the wizard at one time is 250
B. Cannot filter views by more than one campaign at a time
C. Integrated Campaign Builder views are not exposed through the Force.com API
D. Can add converted leads to a campaign
E. The maximum number of Leads/Contacts that can be added from a report at one time is 50,000
title: Question 192

content:
An administrator at Universal Containers has been asked to prevent users from accessing
Salesforce from outside of their network.
What are two considerations for this configuration?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Enforce Login IP Ranges on Every Request must be selected to enforce IP restrictions.
B. IP address restrictions are set on the profile or globally for the org.
C. Single sign-on will allow users to log in from anywhere.
D. Users can change their password to avoid login IP restrictions.
title: Question 193

content:
Universal Containers (UC) would like to count the number of open cases associated with each account and update the account with this value every Friday evening. UC has several hundred open cases at any given time.
What should the administrator use to complete this request?
options: A. Use a scheduled process builder.
B. Use a record trigger flow.
title: Question 194

content: You can use conditional highlighting for summary and matrix report only.
title: Question 195

content: With sharing rules one can make automatic exceptions to the organization-wide default for defined sets of users.

content: Which function can be performed using enhanced profile management? Choose 2 answers
options: A. Edit profile permissions directly in a list view
B. Make mass permission modifications across multiple profiles
D. Make mass profile name changes

content: You must meet the following prerequisites before enabling territory management? Choose 2 answers
options: A. Follow the steps in the Deploying Territory Management Guide to prepare your organization for territory management.
B. You must have the Marketing User Profile
C. Your organization must be using customizable forecasting
D. You must have the Territory Manager Profile

content: On deleting a Tab from an Application ___________.
options: A. Deletes the tab from that Application
B. Deletes that particular Object of whose Tab is deleted
C. Deletes the Tab from Salesforce.com

content: A Lookup Field Relationship Select the correct choice
options: C. Links two page layouts together
D. Links two Salesforce.com instances together

content: Standard profile permissions cannot be edited.

content:
Ursa Major Solar has its business hours set from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM for the reps that are on pacific time. The reps on Eastern Time need business hours set to start 3 hours earlier to cover for support.
How should an administrator solve for this issue?
options: A. Create one set of business hours per time zone.
B. Adjust the currant business hours to accommodate the Eastern Time Zone.
C. Set temporary business hours for each time zone.
D. Allow the reps to set business hours manually.
title: Question 202

content: How should an administrator support this request?
options: A. Refresh weekly reporting snapshots for Closed Opportunities.
B. Add Formula Fields to track Stages on each Opportunity.
C. Run the Opportunity Stage Duration report.
D. Use process builder to capture the daily average on each opportunity.

options: A. Deny a user access to other users leads
B. Prevent a user from viewing custom tabs
C. Prevent the use of Mass email

content: When you delete a product, the opportunity associated with that product will be suspended until further action is taken.

content:
A user at Cloud Kicks is having issues logging in to Salesforce. The user asks the administrator
to reset their password.
Which two options should the administrator consider when resetting the user's password?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Resetting the password will change the user's password policy.
B. Single sign-on users can reset their own passwords using the forgot password link.
C. Resetting a locked-out user's password automatically unlocks the user's account.
D. After resetting a password, the user may be required to activate their device to successfully log
title: Question 208

content: All the following are Main Setup areas in Salesforce.com EXCEPT?

content: How is the expected revenue calculated in the opportunity?
options: A. The sales price on any line item times the probability of the opportunity
B. Amount multiplied by the discount percent
C. Opportunity Amount multiplied by the probability
D. Amount multiplied by the total price of all opportunity line items

content: Can a user create his or her own Default Sales Team?
title: Question 211

content:
What data loss considerations should an administrator keep in mind when changing a custom field type from Text to Picklist?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Auto updates will be made to Visualforce references to prevent data loss.
B. Assignment and escalation rules may be affected.
C. There will be no data loss with use of a global value set.
D. Any list view based on the custom field is deleted.

content:
Universal Containers administrator has been asked to create a many-to-many relationship
between two existing custom objects.
Which two steps should the administrator take when enabling the many-to-many relationship?
Choose 2 answers
options: A. Create a junction with a custom object.
B. Create two master detail relationships on the new object.
C. Create URL fields on a custom object.
D. Create two lookup relationships on the new object.

content: What steps are part of the process to enable Multi-Currency in an organization?
options: D. Contact salesforce.com to enable multiple currencies

content:
DreamHouse Realty (DHR) wants a templated process with a mortgage calculator that generated leads for loans. DHR needs to complete the project within 30 days and has maxed out its budget for the year.
Which AppExchange item should help the administrator to meet the request?

content:
Northern Trail Outfitters has the Case Object set to private. The support manager raised a concern the reps have a boarder view of data than expected and can see all cases on their groups dashboards.
What could be Causing reps to have inappropriate access to data on dashboards?

options: A. As short as an hour and as long as a month
B. As short as a month and as long as an year
C. As short as a day and as long as a forever
D. As short as a month and as long as a quarter

content:
Cloud kicks intends to protect with backups by using the data by using the data export
Service.
Which two considerations should the administrator remember when Scheduling the export?
Choose 2 Answers.
options: A. Data export service should be run from a sandbox.
B. Data Backups are limited to weekly or monthly intervals.
C. Metadata backups must be run via a separate process.
D. Metadata Backups are limited a sandbox refresh intervals.

limited access to child records.

content:
Northern Trail outfitters has hired interns to enter Leads into Salesforce and has requested a
way to is identify these new records from existing Leads.
What approach should an administrator take to meet this requirement?
options: A. Create a separate Lead Lightning App.
B. Update the active Leas Assignment Rules.
C. Define a record type and assign it to the interns.
D. Set up Web-to-Lead form the interns use.
title: Question 230

content:
Ursa Major Solar offers amazing experiences for all of it employees. The Employee engagement committee wants to post updates while restricting other employees from posting.
What should the administrator create to meet this request?
